name: MMav, Journal De Bord (Tome3) - "Nouveaux Territoires". Limited to 30 copies.
description:
Journal De Bord III "Nouveaux Territoires" - the PARIS ISSUE - combine different aspects of our lives with a particular attention to details. 

From photography to essay, personal stories, interviews, 
this time we took the time to enjoy our hometown, Paris - meet people and share their stories.

**
- 158 pages.
- Black & White printed.
- A5 shape. 
- 300 g cover.
- 80 g cream (inside pages)
- Numbered & Limited to 30 copies.
- Contains 3 color polaroid.
**
Shipping cost : 
3.50 € (International)
1.80 € (France)

COMING SOON.

name: MMav, Journal De Bord (Tome2) - "HomeLike". Limited to 70 copies.
description:
Journal De Bord II "HomeLike" - the BERLIN ISSUE - combine different aspects of our lives with a particular attention to details. 

From photography to essay, personal stories, interviews and illustration works. This time we tooked the road to Berlin where we stayed a few days, enjoy the weather and the places.

Meeting people, sharing our stories with you, discovering things and write it down, it's the meaning du Journal.

**
- 94 pages.
- Black & White printed.
- A5 shape. 
- 300 g cover.
- 80 g cream (inside pages)
- Numbered & Limited to 70 copies.
- Contains 1 bookmark & 1 A6 full color postcard.
**
Shipping cost : 
3.50 € (International)
1.80 € (France)
**
More images, on the JOURNAL section..

name: MMav, Journal De Bord (Tome1) - "NoBones".
description:
During the first few weeks, when we learned the date of our upcoming exhibition, we were quickly thinking about all the stuff surrounding the preparation. The artworks, the display & the story.  We tought that when all of this would be over, we needed something aside from our souvenir about this great experience.
That's when the concept from the Journal was launched.

**
- 48 pages.
- Full color printed.
- A5 shape with a 180 g cover.
- Limited to 70 copies.
- Contains 1 bookmark & 1 A6 full color postcard.
**
Shipping cost : 
3.50 € (International)
1.80 € (France)
**
More images, on the JOURNAL section..
